text: llh subhanah wteala malak alsmwat wal'ard wama fyhma, yakhluq ma yasha' min alkhlq, yahab liman yasha' min eibadih 'inathana la dhkwr mehn, wayahab liman yasha' aldhukur la 'inath mehm, wyety subhanah wteala liman yasha' min alnaas aldhikr walantha, wayajeal man yasha' eqymana la yualid lh, 'iinah ealim bima yakhluq, qadir ealaa khalq ma ysha', la yejzh shay' 'arad khlqh
